name: Vy Cao's portfolio
headerTaglineThree: A Computer Science student specialized in Artificial Intelligence
headerTaglineFour: Focused on building intelligent systems with Machine Learning, NLP, and Deep Learning

projects.title: Hate Speech Detection
projects.description: Developed a Transformer-based model using the HateXplain dataset to classify input text into hateful, offensive, or normal categories, aiming to enhance content moderation by distinguishing varying degrees of harmful language.

projects.title: Winx (Project in Vietnam Datathon 2023)
projects.description: Analyzed CCTV footage to identify in-store customer behavior patterns and proposed real-time dynamic advertising adjustments to enhance marketing effectiveness.

projects.title: FoodFeast
projects.description: A mobile app that suggests personalized recipes based on user input, with themed dish listings, rankings, and social sharing features.

projects.title: Bicomplex Embeddings in Multimodal Knowledge Graph Completion
projects.description: My undergraduate thesis exploring the use of bicomplex embeddings to model multimodal datasets and address challenges in multimodal knowledge graph completion.

leadership.title: Organizer â€“ Universityâ€™s Largest IT Academic Competition
leadership.description: Co-organized and coordinated logistics, communications, and technical operations for the university's largest annual academic competition in Information Technology, attracting hundreds of student participants.

leadership.title: Core Member â€“ Student Club for IT Activities & Engagement
leadership.description: Actively participated in planning and hosting student events, technical workshops, and social programs to promote peer learning and collaboration within the universityâ€™s IT student community.

leadership.title: TEDx Organizer â€“ TEDx Event Featuring AI & Automation Expert
leadership.description: Co-hosted a TEDx event featuring Udhir Tiku (AI and Automation Expert), aimed at promoting public awareness and interdisciplinary dialogue around emerging AI technologies and their impact on society.

services.title: Participated in Code Like a Girl 2023
services.description: A mobile app promoting environmental sustainability by enabling users to spontaneously offer or request rides from one another, reducing traffic congestion and carbon emissions through a community-driven ride-sharing model.

services.title: Participated in She Codes Hackathon 2023
services.description: A web platform where users can become mentors in their areas of expertise and receive guidance from others in return. I contributed primarily to idea development and led the UI/UX design management.

services.title: Participated in TikTok TechJam 2024
services.description: We developed a generative AI-powered tool to help content creators generate ideas and produce content faster and more creatively.

awards.title: GeoComply Hope Scholarship â€“ April 2024
awards.description: Awarded for outstanding academic performance and active involvement in extracurricular activities in the field of Information Technology.

awards.title: Deanâ€™s List â€“ Semester 1 and 3 (2022) & Semester 3 (2024)
awards.description: Recognized for exceptional academic achievements, consistently ranking among the top students, and actively participating in university activities.

awards.title: Top 24 Vietnam Datathon 2024
awards.description: Led analysis of customer behavior trends from CCTV data, contributed core ideas, guided project direction, and oversaw UI design for a dynamic in-store advertising screen.

aboutpara: I am a dedicated and forward-thinking Computer Science student with a strong focus on Artificial Intelligence. I am driven by a constant desire to learn, improve, and contribute to meaningful technological solutions. With every project, I seek not only to apply what I know but to expand my capabilitiesâ€”technically, creatively, and collaboratively. My goal is to grow into a developer who builds systems that are both intelligent and impactful.
